Method Summary
static java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String url)
          encode translates a URL String into x-www-form-urlencoded formated String value using the URLEncoder.encode() method.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          main is the executable method of this class to invoke the URLEncode object at the command line as a utility to convert URLs to x-www-form-urlencoded format.
